name: Bread & Butter (Inside Goods & Co.)
hours: (Sunday: 11:00 - 16:00), (Tuesday - Friday: 11:00 - 18:00), (Saturday: 11:00 - 16:00) * - online orders possible after these times, check the website for availability
text:
BREAD & BUTTER
FROM THE NEIGHBOURS' COOKING
Sandwiches
TIMELESS CLASSICS
Traditional Clubhouse $13.99 Chicken, Mayo, Cheese, Lettuce, Tomato; and Bacon on three layers of House Toast
Herbaceous Chicken $11.99 Chicken, Herbaceous Mayo, Leafy Greens, Tomato, Red Onion; and Swiss on Grilled House Loaf
The Reuben $12.99 House Cured Beef, Swiss Cheese, Sauerkraut; and Russian Dressing on Grilled Rye
Beef Dip & Au Jus $15.99 House Roast Beef, Caramelised Onions, Provolone on Baguette; served with Jus
Classic B.L.T. $7.99 Bacon, Lettuce, Tomatoes; and Mayo on House Toast Make it Wicked: Herbaceous Mayo, Celery, Havarti and Dill Bacon + $3
Cubano $10.99 Pulled Pork, Sliced Ham, Mustard, Mayo, Swiss Cheese; and Pickle on Baguette
Grilled Cheese Special $?? Check The Specials Board To See What This Weeks Grilled Cheese Is! (This Item Changes Every Week)
WICKED SANDO'S
The Neighbours Clubhouse $15.99 Chicken, Crave Sauce, Havarti, Lettuce, Tomato, Pickle; and extra Bacon on three layers of Brioche
Jerk Chicken $11.99 Pulled Jerk Chicken, Shaved Lettuce, Tomatoes, Red Onion and Sweet Potato Ginger Puree on Baguette
Pulled Pork $11.99 Tender Pulled Pork, Roasted Garlic Mayo, Havarti; and Crispy Fried Onions on Brioche
Lamb on Rye $11.99 Sliced Gyro Loaf, Roasted Zucchini, Red Onion and Our Green Mayo on Rye
Your Heros Hero $17.99 Sliced Gyro Loaf, Ham, Turkey & Salami with Shaved Lettuce, Tomato, Red Onion, Banana Peppers, Roasted Garlic Mayo, Mustard, Swiss & Havarti on house-made Baguette.
VEGGIE LOVERS
Chickpea $10.99 Chickpea Salad, Mayo, Lettuce, Tomato; and Red Onion on House Toast
Mushroom Dip $16.99 Sautéed Fried Mushrooms, Caramelised Onion, Havarti and Roasted Garlic Mayo on Baguette served w/ Mushroom Jus
Pulled Jack Sandwich $13.99 Tender Pulled Jack Fruit, Roasted Garlic Mayo, Crispy Fried Onions, Havarti on Brioche
Italian Roasted Veg $12.99 Roasted Veg (Zucchini, Eggplant and Red Onions) with Leafy Greens, Tomatoes and Herb Mayo
READY TO ORDER?
VISIT OUR WEBSITE & PLACE YOUR ORDER ONLINE
PRE-ORDER: PICK-UP, DELIVERY, DINE IN
WWW.THENEIGHBOURSCOOKING.CA
Salads
Garden House $10.99 Mixed greens, Tomato, Red Onion, Carrot, Cheddar, and House Croutons. Dressings: Vinaigrette/ Ranch/ Russian/ Horseradish Ranch
As Side: $3.50.
Chickpea Salad $7.99 Chickpea, Celery, Red Onion, Bell Pepper, Dill all tossed in our Creamy Crave Dressing
(as a side $2.99)
Maple Bacon Wedge $12.99 Hearty wedge of iceberg lettuce crowned with smoky maple bacon, house-pickled green beans, and sliced green onions, all finished with our bold horseradish ranch.
Caesar $12.99 Chopped Romaine Lettuce, House made Croutons, Red Onions, Chopped Bacon; and Creaming Caesar Dressing
Boss Bowls
Check Our Specials Board For our Amazing Boss Bowls! Specials Range From Home Made Soups, Stews and Chillis to Oooey Gooey Mac & Cheese. You Never Know What's On Special.
BEVERAGES
POP Cans $1.5
Jones Soda $2.5
Water Btl. $1
Hosting an event? Let's make it delicious.
From team lunches and private dinners to birthdays and pop-ups, we offer flexible catering with bold, homemade flavours you won't forget.
Build your own menu with hot dishes, sandwich platters, salads, and our signature sauces—crafted with the same care we bring to every Neighbours event.
And if you need a venue, we've got you covered. Ask about booking The Spot on Red River for your next gathering.
Great food. Thoughtful service. A space that feels like home.
